review.title: “Awesome company”
review.pros: Pros – Nothing to do at all, but paying money for it! They're committed to protecting our community from fraudulent submissions that might affect our ratings and reviews.
review.cons: Cons – No cons, actually. This is a perfect place to work. They review and approve every post before it appears on our site, and in the case that the community sees something suspicious we will look into the issue and take appropriate action.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Beware of the problems of growth
